item.description:
Act now and get FREE PASSES for the film screening of ROCK OF AGES!!!


Warner Brothers is having a free advanced screening of the new film ROCK OF AGES, the new musical starring Tom Cruise, Julianne Hough, Catherine Zeta Jones and many others!

Thursday, June 7th
7:00pm
Providence Place Cinema
Providence, RI

TO DOWNLOAD A PAIR OF PASSES, click this quick link: http://bit.ly/KZyrx2

**Tickets are complimentary, but expected to go quickly as there are only a limited number. Please arrive early as seating will be available on a first come, first served basis and is not guaranteed.


Description: A small-town girl and a big-city boy find their fates intersecting on the Sunset Strip, riding a wave of romance through the height of the "hair metal" scene as the off-Broadway musical rocks its way to the big screen courtesy of choreographer-turned-director Adam Shankman (A Walk to Remember, Hairspray). Arriving in Hollywood with stars in her eyes, Sherrie (Julianne Hough) meets Drew (Diego Boneta), and together they plunge headlong into the local rock scene. Meanwhile, as Sherrie struggles to stay afloat in a churning sea of rock 'n' roll excess, she gets swept off her feet by audacious rock star Stacee Jaxx (Tom Cruise). Russell Brand, Paul Giamatti, and Bryan Cranston co-star in a movie featuring music by Journey, Def Leppard, Poison, Whitesnake, Bon Jovi, Foreigner, Joan Jett, and REO Speedwagon. http://rockofagesmovie.warnerbros.com/
item.how_to_find_us: This is posted as an FYI - if you want to go, please RSVP once you have your tckets so other members know who to look for! Get your passes now and GO EARLY!!!
item.name: P-Collective FYI: Free Movie Passes for ROCK OF AGES!!!!
